what: A Deep Learning Toolkit for Healthcare Predictive Modeling
title: A Deep Learning Toolkit for Healthcare Predictive Modeling
text: RHealth open-source R package specifically designed bring comprehensive deep learning toolkits R community healthcare predictive modeling. Funded ISC grant R Consortium, RHealth aims provide accessible, integrated environment R users. package built upon python version PyHealth.

title: A Deep Learning Toolkit for Healthcare Predictive Modeling
text: Explore relationships within coding systems. #### Get Ancestors get_ancestors():
code: # Example: Find ancestors for ICD-9-CM code "428.22" ancestor_codes <- get_ancestors(code = "428.22", system = "ICD9CM") print(ancestor_codes)

title: A Deep Learning Toolkit for Healthcare Predictive Modeling
code: # Example: Find descendants for ICD-9-CM code "428" descendant_codes <- get_descendants(code = "428", system = "ICD9CM") print(head(descendant_codes)) # Showing first few for brevity print(paste("Total descendants for '428':", length(descendant_codes)))

title: A Deep Learning Toolkit for Healthcare Predictive Modeling
text: RHealth currently active development. initial phase focuses establishing two foundational modules: EHR Database Module: module developed provide standardized framework ingesting, processing, managing diverse Electronic Health Record (EHR) datasets. aims support public datasets like MIMIC-III, MIMIC-IV, eICU, well user-specific data formats OMOP-CDM. goal ensure data consistency subsequent modeling tasks. EHR Code Mapping Module (medcode): module, core medcode component, facilitates mapping within various medical coding systems (e.g., ICD, NDC, RxNorm). Key functionalities like code lookup, hierarchy navigation, cross-system mapping, ATC utilities already implemented, demonstrated examples . Looking ahead, development roadmap includes expansion RHealth several key modules enhancements: Healthcare DL Core Module: module integrate traditional machine learning models (e.g., Random Forests, Support Vector Machines) state---art healthcare-specific deep learning models (e.g., RETAIN, AdaCare, Transformers, graph networks, convolutional networks, recurrent networks). Prediction Task Module: module designed handle various clinical prediction tasks using EHR data, including patient-level predictions (e.g., mortality, disease risk), intra-visit predictions (e.g., length stay, drug recommendation), inter-visit predictions (e.g., readmission risk, future diagnoses). Support Multi-modal Data Integration: Enhancements handle integrate diverse data types beyond structured EHR data. Clinical Trial Applications: Developing functionalities support research analysis context clinical trials. Large Language Model (LLM) Enhancement: Exploring integration LLMs augment package capabilities. RHealth aims provide R community powerful user-friendly toolkit healthcare predictive modeling using deep learning. glad hear feedbacks suggestions via email submitting issues.

what: Truncate an ATC Code to a Specified Level ‚Äî atc_convert
title: Truncate an ATC Code to a Specified Level ‚Äî atc_convert
text: Truncates one ATC codes given number characters, corresponding desired ATC classification level (e.g., anatomical main group, therapeutic subgroup, chemical substance).

title: Truncate an ATC Code to a Specified Level ‚Äî atc_convert
Truncate an ATC Code to a Specified Level ‚Äî atc_convert
text: code character scalar vector ATC codes, e.g. "A01AA01". level integer scalar 1 7 indicating many characters retain. Defaults 5.

title: Truncate an ATC Code to a Specified Level ‚Äî atc_convert
text: character vector truncated ATC codes.

title: Truncate an ATC Code to a Specified Level ‚Äî atc_convert

what: Download and Cache Medical Code CSV ‚Äî download_medcode
title: Download and Cache Medical Code CSV ‚Äî download_medcode
text: Fetches CSV file specified medical code remote server, caches locally, returns path cached file.

title: Download and Cache Medical Code CSV ‚Äî download_medcode
Download and Cache Medical Code CSV ‚Äî download_medcode
text: name single character string specifying code name (without ".csv"), e.g. "ICD10" "CPT".

title: Download and Cache Medical Code CSV ‚Äî download_medcode
text: single character string giving full path downloaded previously cached CSV file.

title: Download and Cache Medical Code CSV ‚Äî download_medcode
text: default, package loaded, .onLoad() sets options(RHealth.medcode_base) "https://storage.googleapis.com/pyhealth/resource/". CSV downloaded file.path(getOption("RHealth.medcode_base"), paste0(name, ".csv")). override download location, set base URL calling: Cached files stored : file.path(rappdirs::user_cache_dir("RHealth"), "medcode").

title: Download and Cache Medical Code CSV ‚Äî download_medcode
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Use default server path1 <- download_medcode("ICD10")  # Use a custom server options(RHealth.medcode_base = "https://internal.example.com/medcode/") path2 <- download_medcode("CPT") } # }

Map a Code from One System to Another ‚Äî map_code
text: code single character string specifying code map. single character string naming source code system (e.g. "ICD9CM", "ATC"). Must one systems listed supported_inner(). single character string naming target code system (e.g. "CCSCM", "NDC"). pair paste0(, "_to_", ) must one supported_cross().
